text: Tamen xiang ni [mu sheng] xunwen xin yue. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Xin yue shi gong renlei he chaojin jishi de.” Nimen cong fangwu de houmian jinru fangwu bushi qianjing, er qianjing shi jingwei [an la]. Suoyi, nimen dang cong zhengmen jinru fangwu [zhu]. Nimen dang jingwei an la, yibian nimen chenggong.
